divs: sighting detailsi was at home with a bunch of friends, we were all outside gettin ready for the new year looking at the full moon which also happened to be a blue moon.we all were admiring the moon and the big ring around it when a orange light popped into sight and slowly started moving north across the sky..right when we all seen it we were all saying how bright it was and that it wasnt flying in a straight line so immedietly we all thought ufo and a friend pulled out her video camera and started recording..i'll send the footage in today when i get a copy.so we were watching\recording the 1 orange light and another 1 appeared in the skybehind it and started following the first 1 but at a distance and at that point we all were convinced these are ufo's..they clearly were not a plane or jet or missile or anything any of us had ever seen.they were completely silent and seemed amazingly high in altitude...and they did not in any way resemble a satelite...so we all just watched as they flew into the distance until we lost sight cause they flew above the clouds..i live in san jose california and it was crystal clear where they first came into view in front of the moon..i've already seen youtube footage of them and i will be posting a copy of the video there as well when i get the video from my friend today..this is a huge city and i know lotsa people had to see these things they were big and bright and very very noticeable!!!
